name: FIRdesign
author: AFNI Team
description: Uses the Remez algorithm to calculate the FIR filter weights for a bandpass filter; results are written to stdout in an unadorned (no header) column of numbers.

inputs.description: Lowest frequency in the pass band.
inputs.name: Low Passband Frequency

inputs.description: Highest frequency in the pass band, must be higher than fbot and <= 0.5/TR.
inputs.name: High Passband Frequency

inputs.description: Number of filter weights (AKA 'taps') to use, must be in the range 8..2000 (inclusive).
inputs.name: Number of Taps

inputs.description: Set time grid spacing to 'dd' [default is 1.0]
inputs.name: Time Grid Spacing

inputs.description: Alternative way to specify the passband
inputs.name: Alternative Passband

inputs.description: Alternative way to specify the number of taps
inputs.name: Alternative Number of Taps
